titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that any additional revenues resulting from the imposition of, or any change in, any tax or fee should be applied to reducing our Nation's public debt.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/5/1993--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that revenues resulting from the imposition of, or any change in, any tax or fee should be applied to reducing the public debt.
